Framework7 table

Source: R/f7-tables.R
f7Table.Rd

Creates a table container.

Usage

f7Table(data, colnames = NULL, card = FALSE)

Arguments

data

A data.frame.

colnames

Column names to use, if NULL uses data column names.

card

Whether to use as card.

Examples

library(shiny)
library(shinyMobile)

app <- shinyApp(
  ui = f7Page(
    title = "My app",
    f7SingleLayout(
      navbar = f7Navbar(
        title = "f7Table"
      ),
      uiOutput("table")
    )
  ),
  server = function(input, output) {
    output$table <- renderUI({
      f7Table(mtcars)
    })
  }
)

if (interactive() || identical(Sys.getenv("TESTTHAT"), "true")) app
